fields.text:
Flexible, scalable and secure
-------------------------------------------------

* Customisable and flexible to support any funding process
* Fully cloud-based solution to scale to your needs
* Data security and ownership means no privacy concerns

Save time and minimise stress
-------------------------

* Reduce time taken to administer and assess applications for funding
* No more searching for updated spreadsheets, documents or e-mails

Creating Start-Up Success
View more presentations from Alexander Osterwalder.

Powering business plan competitions, grant proposals and early-stage funding
------------------------------

* Full integrated solution for existing funding processes and workflows
* Excellent user design built with ease-of-use in mind

When you first signed up for this competition we should have sent you an email with a link to your saved application. 

If you don't have that message, enter your email below and we'll send you another reminder.
We send the link through email instead of just showing it to you to help keep your application private.
“NVANA powers the London Entrepreneurs Challenge and allows us to focus more on supporting student entrepreneurs instead of worrying about administrative issues...”

fields.default_text:
Your pitch has been received. Thanks for applying and good luck!

We'll keep you in the loop via email as the competition progresses.

You can edit your application until judging begins by returning to this webpage, which is linked in the first email we sent you.
fields.tooltip:
This message is shown to applicants on-screen after they've submitted the first version of their pitch.

It should tell them that their pitch has been received and they're officially in the contest.
fields.title: thanks for applying
